sentences.en: ...Mencken's strictures on the 1920s, with its self-righteous prohibition on alcohol and unconventional ideas.
sentences.cn: ...门肯对20世纪20年代自以为是的禁酒令及对非传统思想的禁锢的苛评。

sentences.en: All carotid stricture or obliteration occurred at the initial part.
sentences.cn: 结果:颈内动脉严重狭窄或闭塞全部发生在起始部.

sentences.en: Among these teachings was the church stricture against meat during Lent.
sentences.cn: 其中的教义是狭窄的教堂对吃肉四旬期期间.

sentences.en: Conclusions: Anastomotic stricture 、 stones and obstruction are the major causes of reoperation.
sentences.cn: 结论: 吻合口狭窄结石梗阻是再手术的主要原因.

sentences.en: Conclusions: Urethroplasty is an effective procedure for treatment of children's urethral stricture.
sentences.cn: 结论: 尿道成形术治疗小儿尿道狭窄疗效确切.

sentences.en: If stricture develops, bouginage will be needed.
sentences.cn: 若狭窄发生, 则需用探条扩张术.

sentences.en: Imaging studies and ureteroscopy showed a right sac - like kidney with a right lower ureteral stricture.
sentences.cn: 影像检查及输尿管镜检查显示右襄肾及右下输尿管狭窄.

sentences.en: Mechanical obstruction may require operation for repair of common bile duct stricture or for gallstones.
sentences.cn: 机械性梗阻可能需要手术以修复胆总管狭窄或除去胆石.

sentences.en: Objective To evaluate the effects of holmium laser on the treatment of urethral stricture in children.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨钬激光在治疗小儿尿道狭窄中的应用效果.

sentences.en: Objective To review operative experiences of colon interposition for caustic stricture of esophagus.
sentences.cn: ]目的总结结肠代食管治疗食管腐蚀性瘢痕狭窄的经验及效果.

sentences.en: Objective To review our experience with the treatment of urethral stricture.
sentences.cn: 目的提高外伤性后尿道狭窄的治疗效果.

sentences.en: Objective To study how to treat esophageal stricture by memory alloy stent.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨记忆合金支架置入术治疗食管狭窄的技术问题.

sentences.en: Simple urethral stricture may be managed conservatively by dilation or urethrotomy . However, urethroplasty may be required.
sentences.cn: 单纯尿道狭窄可用尿道扩张及尿道切开等保守法治疗, 但有时需行尿道成形术.

sentences.en: The oer all operative morbidity an incidence of anastomotic leak 4.7 % and anastomotic stricture 2.54 %.
sentences.cn: 总并发症率11%,吻合口瘘发生率4.7%,吻合口狭窄发生率2.54%.横结肠是全食管的理想替代物.

sentences.en: This satirical address was a thinly disguised stricture against the doctrine of the rights of man.
sentences.cn: 这一充满讽刺意味的演说几乎是对人权主义不加掩饰的指责.

sentences.en: Urethral meatus stricture were treated mainly by urethral dilation and anastomosis site stricture by operation.
sentences.cn: 对尿道外口狭窄主要行扩张治疗,对吻合口狭窄应以手术治疗为主.

sentences.en: Your goals are hindered by financial strictures.
sentences.cn: 你的目标受到经济条件的限制。

trans.tran_cn: 苛评，指责，紧束， 约束
